Verses: 1 isravel Puththirar Marupadiyum Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhapadiyaal, Karththar Avargalai Naarpadhu Varushamalavum Pelisthar Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar.
2 appozhudhu Thaan Vamsaththaanaagiya Soraa Ooraanaana Oru Manushan Irundhaan; Avan Per Manovaa; Avan Manaivi Pillaiperaadha Maladiyaayirundhaal.
3 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Andha Sthreekku Dharisanamaagi, Avalai Nokki: Idho, Pillaiperaadha Maladiyaana Nee Karppandhariththu, Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaai.
4 aadhalaal Nee Dhraatcharasamum Madhubaanamum Kudiyaadhapadikkum, Theettaanadhu Ondrum Pusiyaadhapadikkum Echcharikkaiyaayiru.

5 nee Karppandhariththu, Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaai; Avan Thalaiyinmel Savaragan Kaththi Padalaagaadhu; Andhap Pillai Pirandhadhumudhal Dhevanukkendru Nasareyanaayiruppaan; Avan Isravelaip Pelistharin Kaikku Neengalaakki Ratchikkath Thodanguvaan Endraar.

6 appozhudhu Andha Sthree Than Purushanidaththil Vandhu: Dhevanudaiya Manushan Oruvar Ennidaththil Vandhaar; Avarudaiya Saayal Dhevanudaiya Thoodharin Saayalaippola Magaa Bayangaramaayirundhadhu; Engeyirundhu Vandheer Endru Naan Avaridaththil Ketkavillai; Avar Thammudaiya Naamaththai Enakku Sollavumillai.

7 avar Ennai Nokki: Idho, Nee Karppandhariththu, Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaai; Aadhalaal Nee Dhraatcharasamum Madhubaanamum Kudiyaamalum, Theettaanadhu Ondrum Pusiyaamalum Iru; Andhap Pillai Pirandhadhu Mudhal Than Marananaal Mattum Dhevanukkendru Nasareyanaayiruppaan Endru Sonnaar Endraal.

8 appozhudhu Manovaa Karththarai Nokki Vinnappampanni: Aa, En Aandavare, Neer Anuppina Dhevanudaiya Manushan Marupadiyum Oruvisai Engalidaththil Vandhu, Pirakkappogira Pillaikkaaga Naangal Seyyavendiyadhai Engalukkuk Karpippaaraaga Endru Vendikkondaan.

9 dhevan Manovaavin Saththaththukku Sevikoduththaar; Andha Sthree Vayal Veliyil Irukkumpodhu Dhevanudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Thirumbavum Avalidaththil Vandhaar; Appozhudhu Aval Purushanaagiya Manovaa Avalode Irukkavillai.
10 aagaiyaal Andha Sthree Seekkiramaai Odi, Idho, Andru Ennidaththil Vandhavar Enakku Dharisanamaanaar Endru Than Purushanukku Ariviththaal.
11 appozhudhu Manovaa Ezhundhirundhu, Than Manaiviyin Pinnaale Poi, Avaridaththukku Vandhu: Indha Sthreeyode Pesinavar Neerdhaanaa Endru Avaridaththil Kettaan; Avar Naan Thaan Endraar.
12 appozhudhu Manovaa: Neer Sonnakaariyam Niraiverumpodhu, Andhap Pillaiyai Eppadi Valarkkavendum, Adhai Eppadi Nadaththavendum Endru Kettaan.
13 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Manovaavai Nokki: Naan Sthreeyode Sonna Yaavatrirkum, Aval Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu,

14 dhraatchachchediyile Undaagiradhondrum Saappidaamalum, Dhraatcharasamum Madhubaanamum Kudiyaamalum, Theettaanadhondrum Pusiyaamalum, Naan Avalukkuk Kattalaiyittadhaiyellaam Kaikkollakkadaval Endraar.
15 appozhudhu Manovaa Karththarudaiya Thoodhanai Nokki: Naangal Oru Vellaattukkuttiyai Umakkaaga Samaiththukkonduvarumattum Thariththirum Endraan.

16 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Manovaavai Nokki: Nee Ennai Irukka Sonnaalum Naan Un Unavaip Pusiyen; Nee Sarvaanga Thaganapali Idavendumaanaal, Adhai Nee Karththarukku Seluththuvaayaaga Endraar. Avar Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Endru Manovaa Ariyaadhirundhaan.
17 appozhudhu Manovaa Karththarudaiya Thoodhanai Nokki: Neer Sonnakaariyam Niraiverumpodhu, Naangal Ummai Ganampannumpadi Ummudaiya Naamam Enna Endru Kettaan.
18 adharkuk Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar; En Naamam Enna Endru Nee Ketkavendiyadhu Enna? Adhu Adhisayam Endraar.

19 manovaa Poi, Vellaattuk Kuttiyaiyum, Pojanapaliyaiyum Konduvandhu, Adhaik Kanmalaiyinmel Karththarukku Seluththinaan; Appozhudhu Manovaavum Avan Manaiviyum Paarththukkondirukkaiyil, Adhisayam Vilanginadhu.

20 akkinijuvaalai Palipeedaththilirundhu Vaanaththirku Neraaga Ezhumbugaiyil, Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Palipeedaththin Juvaalaiyile Eripponaar; Adhai Manovaavum Avan Manaiviyum Kandu, Tharaiyile Mugankuppura Vizhundhaargal.
21 pinbu Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Manovaavukkum Avan Manaivikkum Kaanappadavillai; Appozhudhu Avar Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Endru Manovaa Arindhu,
22 than Manaiviyaip Paarththu: Naam Dhevanaik Kandom, Saagave Saavom Endraan.

23 adharku Avan Manaivi: Karththar Nammaik Kondrupoda Siththamaayirundhaal, Avar Nammudaiya Kaiyile Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Pojanapaliyaiyum Oppukkollamaattaar, Ivaigalaiyellaam Namakkuk Kaanbikkavumaattaar, Ivaigalai Namakku Arivikkavumaattaar Endraal.
24 pinbu Andha Sthree Oru Kumaaranaip Petru, Avanukku Simson Endru Perittaal. Andhap Pillai Valarndhadhu; Karththar Avanai Aaseervadhiththaar.
25 avan Soraavukkum Esthaavolukkum Naduvilulla Thaanin Paalayaththil Irukkaiyil Karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Avanai Evaththuvakkinaar.
